subject: Message texts
msgSnippet: What s the consensus on the style of message texts? E.g., assertTrue( Should be true , someBoolean); or assertTrue( Is true , someBoolean); or
messageBody:
What's the consensus on the style of message texts?
E.g.,
assertTrue("Should be true", someBoolean);
or
assertTrue("Is true", someBoolean);
or
assertTrue(someBoolean); // !

I usually use the former; what is typically done "in the real world"?


Thanks
--David Plass
Teledata Communications, Inc.
